title: The onus of submitting authenticity of the structure for which repairs have been proposed shall enti
clause_text: The onus of submitting authenticity of the structure for which repairs have been proposed shall entirely vest with owner/NOC holder
section: Repairs to be carried out can be categorized as detailed below:
